column4: hello - I've got a question mostly because of curiosity: is there any reason the DVD distribution is SO hard to find? everything seems to "push" you towards the CD builds and you have to dig hard to reach a DVD one
hard to find? ubuntu gutsy dvd iso top link or so will do it
the two most obvious locations are: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download and http://releases.ubuntu.com/releases/8.04 ...where is the DVD?
